content:
HTA has registered the following external code system owned by the CDC NHSN. The information on this page has been reviewed by the HTA and the code system owner (CDC). The process to have it accurately represented at terminology.hl7.org is in progress. To comment on the CDC NHSN code system, please do so on a corresponding JIRA ticket.

CDC NHSN
https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=97478148

Thanks,
Carol
@Jessica Snell @Ted Klein @Sheila Abner
